Tell me about "Stony Brook Medicine" company. If you don't know this company, respond nothing. Write at least 500 words

Stony Brook Medicine is a hospital and medical center located in Long Island, New York. It is part of the Stony Brook University system and provides a variety of medical services, including cancer care, cardiology, emergency medicine, and more. It is also a major research center and educates health professionals in a variety of disciplines. The hospital is staffed by more than 1,400 physicians and 1,550 nurses, and provides a wide range of inpatient, outpatient, and ambulatory services. Stony Brook Medicine is committed to providing the highest quality of care to all patients, regardless of their socioeconomic background. The hospital works to ensure that all patients receive the care they need and deserve, regardless of their ability to pay. In addition to providing medical services, Stony Brook Medicine is also a major research center, with more than 400 research studies taking place every year. The hospital is also a leader in the education of healthcare professionals, offering a variety of degree programs in medicine, nursing, dentistry, and other fields. Stony Brook Medicine is dedicated to providing the highest quality care to all patients, educating future healthcare professionals, and advancing the boundaries of medical research.
